column1: Valle Hermoso is a city in Valle Hermoso Municipality in the northeastern part of the Mexican state of Tamaulipas.  The city serves as the municipal seat of the municipality
column2: which is bordered by the municipalities of Matamoros and Río Bravo. At the census of 2010 the city had a population of 48
column4: while the municipality had a population of 63
